title: Lucid Dreaming - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/1/18
itunes:title: Lucid Dreaming - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/1/18
description:
George Noory and psychologist David Jay Brown discuss the phenomenon of lucid dreaming where you are awake and aware inside a dream, and can gain valuable insight into your waking life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
